name: WP Atom Importer
author: Piers Karsenbarg

sections.description:
This was ripped beautifully from the standard WordPress RSS importer. A lot of the functionality was taken from there and tweaked so it could handle atom feeds so credit to them.

Everything else was done by Piers Karsenbarg.
sections.installation:
Easy way:

  1. Install from WordPress plugin directory
  2. Activate!
  3. The plugin can be used by going Tools > Import > Atom Import

Slightly more complicated way (requires FTP or server access):

  1. Copy the wp-atom-importer.php file into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate!
  3. The plugin can be used by going Tools > Import > Atom Import
sections.changelog: • v0.9 – First submission to the WordPress directory

short_description: Plugin to allow easy importing of atom feeds to blog.
